Events, Parties & Weddings
Live Acoustic Duo
Find Out More

We’re Stacey & John, an accomplished acoustic duo based on the South Coast of England.

We met doing what we love and have made music together ever since.

We’ve got an eclectic repertoire of over than two and a half hours of covers, from soulful oldies to contemporary classics.

Whether you want a party or mellow background music, we’ll tailor our set to suit your needs.
